entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
